name: readdcli

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cr)
-| wcel(c1, cr)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cr)
-| wcel(c1, cr)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr)
-| wcel(c0, cr)
-| wcel(c1, cr)

comment: Closure law for addition of reals. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-1997.)
